sudden realization connections

2006-10-26

Yesterday I realized that so far in my young life I lived within three kilometers of both Mount Vesuvius and Hiroshima ground zero, for three months and nine months respectively.

___
PS: Sorry I have not posted since before Italy, was going to do a write-up for that trip but never got around to it and didn't want to post something else before that got up. There have been some photojournal posts, tho.
